description: Try our easy to follow Thai Curry Chicken Pies recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Thai Curry Chicken Pies Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200째C. Lightly grease 6 x 12cm pie tins. Halve shortcut pastry sheets diagonally and use to line tins, trimming excess. Fill with chicken mixture. Brush edges with a little egg. Cut 6 x 12.5cm rounds from puff or rough pastry sheets and brush with egg. Place egg-side down over filling, pressing edges with a fork to seal. Brush tops with egg. Decorate, using trimmed pastry, if desired. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden. Serve.

Decorate, using trimmed pastry, if desired. Bake for 45 minutes or until golden. Serve.
